data.value: How you control the data you capture

data.name: consent.gabber.body.control
data.value:
Gabber provides you with control over how you want your audio conversation to be used and who you want to be able to listen and comment on it. Gabber works best when other people can access, listen and learn from the experiences you record. All participants will receive an email with a unique link to the audio recording, where you can view or change your consent on who can access the recording. This email may go to your SPAM/JUNK folder.

Your conversation will undergo a 24-hour embargo where only participants can listen. After this period the audio conversation will be available based on the consent you choose below or if you have changed it in the email afterwards.

By being part of this conversation you will also become a project member where you can listen to other project conversations and help make sense of them through the website.

data.name: debriefing.ui.page.first.content
data.value:
Thank you for sharing your experiences for {0}, which has been saved and is ready to be uploaded. By being part of this conversation you will also become a project member where you can listen to other project conversations and help make sense of them through the website. We hope that you revisit the content to create discussions with participants in the conversation and other project members.

CHANGING YOUR CONSENT

The recording is only available to participants of the conversation for the first 24-hours. When the recording is uploaded all participants will receive a unique link to view and modify the consent you agreed on and provided before recording ({1}). This email may go to your SPAM/JUNK folders, so be sure to check there if you have not received it.
